nodes.text: Now, if you'll excuse me, I must go back to meditating.
Hi! Oh, it's you! I hope you're not here to kill me. If you don't mind, could you wait until after I finish meditating?
Is this a trick question? It's the Master, right?
Now, if you'll excuse me, I must go back to meditating.
Oh, it's you again. I don't mean to be rude, but I am meditating . . .
Hello, sister. No I've been meditating like a good initiate, waiting to be christened by the Servitors. I'm sure there's nothing to worry about.
You know, there are people who say really bad things about you. You ought to do something about that . . .
Now, if you'll excuse me, I must go back to meditating.
I am armed, of course, if reason will not sway our enemies, but I do not arm myself to excess. Is there no ammo in the Gift Shoppe?
I don't know. Perhaps he will reveal himself in time.
He who submits will be christened by the Holy Flame, but the faithful will not be burned. He who goes through Fire without burning shall have life everlasting . . .
Now, if you'll excuse me, I must go back to meditating.
Hi. I'm meditating. Did you notice? Can I help you?
Hello, sister. Can I help you?
Now, if you'll excuse me, I must go back to meditating.
That Father Morpheus, he sure can talk; and he's handsome, too!
Hello, miss. Can I help you?
Excuse me, could you put away your weapon? I can't meditate on peace when I'm, like, uh, staring certain death in the face. Thank you very much.
I'm not sure which of these is a metaphor. Maybe he's everywhere.
I hope I didn't miss anything . . .
Oh no, sister, I do not require assistance. Please excuse me.
Now, if you'll excuse me, I must go back to meditating.
Why sister, nothing so impure profanes the Cathedral. I would let the high priests know if such sins were being committed.
Why no. No help at all. Goodbye.

links.text: Sure. You notice anything unusual around here?
Where can I find the Master?
I'm looking for large quantities of liquor. I'd like to remove them  from the premises . . .
Care to share any favorite meditations with me?
Where can I find the Master?
